definitions.definition: An image or representation of an idea ; a representation of an ideal form ; an apparition of some actual or imaginary entity , or of some aspect of reality .
A phantom ; a ghost or an elusive entity .
An unsubstantial image ; a spectre ; a phantom .

main_definition: An image or representation of an idea ; a representation of an ideal form ; an apparition of some actual or imaginary entity , or of some aspect of reality .
secondary_definitions: A phantom ; a ghost or an elusive entity .
An unsubstantial image ; a spectre ; a phantom .
